name: Mech Mechanic v2 (not jam)
description:
This is a patched version of Mech Mechanic

 use 1920 x 1080 pls.

You are a Mechanic in a walking city, This city is being bombarded by enemies and nature alike, to save this city you must keep the engines and subsystems online, each day you assess the damage to the robot and the civilians, you can trade with the civilians for precious materials or upgrades, The Engines are starting and you need to get fixin' lets get to work!

probably buggy... good luck...
